steps.title: Purchase Order
steps.content: This section shows your purchase order

steps.title: Purchase Order
steps.content: This section allows you to create a Draft,Redesign Order,Submit the Order,Approve the Order,Process the Order,Complete the Order,Reject the Order

steps.title: Draft
steps.content: This section allows you to create a Draft

steps.title: Redesign
steps.content: This section allows you to Redesign Order

steps.title: Submit
steps.content: This section allows you to approve or cancel or redesignthe order

steps.title: Approved Order
steps.content: This section allows you to start process on the order

steps.title: Processed Order
steps.content: This section allows you to mark the process which has been completed

steps.title: Canceled Order
steps.content: This section shows the rejected order
